nodes.text: Count (male) or countess (female) was a title of nobility. Dooku, a Sith Lord and the political leader of the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars, was the count of the planet Serenno. Dooku reclaimed his title of count, along with his ancestral lands and wealth on Serenno, after he abandoned the Jedi Order, killing his brother Ramil, who had taken the title following the death of their father, Gora. Dooku's mother Anya also held the title Countess alongside Gora before his death. During the reign of the Galactic Empire, Chrodber also had the title of count of Serenno. The thorilide mogul Denetrius Vidian was also a count. As such, he was addressed as "my lord." Ursa Wren, leader of the Mandalorian Clan Wren, was a countess. New Republic senator Jogurner held the title of count. Alissyndrex delga Cantonica Provincion was the Countess of Canto Bight in 34 ABY.
